synopsis.text: After tragedy leaves her an orphan, young Sarasa finds purpose pursuing her late parents' career of alchemy. She excels in her training at the prestigious Royal Alchemist Academy and graduates with high hopes of opening her own alchemy shop. However, lacking funds, she must make do with a remote, run-down store gifted by her teacher. Though isolated and facing dangers like monsters and bandits, determined Sarasa sets up shop, gathering ingredients and creating wares while striving to become a master alchemist. Despite the challenges, she remains upbeat, embracing the slow-paced countryside life and steadfastly working to achieve her dream of being the country's top alchemist. With perseverance and passion, Sarasa sets out on her own exciting alchemical adventure.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
